name: Hitmonchan
flavorText:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

previous.name: Hitmonlee
previous.flavorText:
When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

next.name: Lickitung
next.flavorText:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.

pokemon.name: Tyrogue
pokemon.flavorText:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.flavorText:
When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.flavorText:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.

pokemon.name: Hitmontop
pokemon.flavorText:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.
